maqras.text: Mav creatures sight DI est surd dumb who ne kompren
Hav DI kon de any bon en them Li far them hearers! Eben se Li far them hearers ili ankoraux turn aversion
O vi kred vi respond DI messenger when li invit vi ki don vi life! Vi kon ti DI est closer al vi than your kor kaj ke antaux Him vi summoned
Beware da retribution ne lim evildoers vi! Vi kon ti di retribution est severe
Memor vi uz est few oppressed tim ke popol snatch vi Li granted vi secure sanctuary supported vi His victory proviz vi bon provisions vi est appreciative
O vi kred ne perfid DI messenger ne perfid those fid vi tuj ke vi kon
Vi kon ke your mon your infan est test DI posed great recompense
O vi kred vi reverence DI Li enlighten vi remit your pek forgive vi! DI POSED infinite grace
disbelievers plot scheme neutralize vi kill vi banish vi! Tamen ili plot scheme tial does DI! DI EST PUT schemer
When our revelations recited them ili dir Ni auxd. Se ni wanted ni dir sam ajx! These est ne plur than tales el preter
Ili ankaux dir Our di this est really truth Vi tiam dusx us rok cxiel versx us painful punishment
Di ne est pun them while vi est their midst; DI ne est pun them while ili streb forgiveness
Hav ili ne ind di retribution per repelling others Sankt Masjid eben kvankam ili ne est custodians thereof? Prav custodians thereof est righteous plej de them ne kon
Their Kontakt Prayers (Salat) shrine (Ka bah) est ne plur than mockery means repelling popol crowding them out)! Do sufer retribution your disbelief
Those disbelieve spend their mon repel others voj DI. Ili spend gxi tiam gxi turn into sorrow remorse them. Ultimately ili defeated all disbelievers summoned al Infer
DI testament KRIBR FOR MAV EL BON TIAM pile MAV sur top da each ali all EN 1 pile TIAM JXET GXI INFER! Such est losers
Tell those disbelieved ili stop all their preter forgiven! Sed se ili return ili incur sam sort their previous counterparts
Vi batal them ward oppression practice your religi devoted al DI sol! Ili refrain aggression tiam DI est fully Seer de cxio ili do
Ili turn tiam vi kon ti DI est your Lord Mastr; bon Lord Mastr put supporter
